#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int i,j,k,t,n,sum;
    int a[110];
    cin >> t;
    while(t--){
        cin >> n;
        sum = 0;
        for(i = 0; i < n;i++){
            cin >> a[i];
        }
        for(i = 0;i < n; i++){
            while(a[i] >= i+1){
                a[i] -= (i+1);
                sum++;
            }
        }
        if(sum%2 == 0){
            cout << "BOB"<<endl;
        }
        else
            cout << "ALICE" << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
